definition: to consider past cause and future effect (idiom); to think over the past and future/to ponder over reasons and connection
to think/to consider
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to think/to believe/to suppose/to wish/to want/to miss (feel wistful about the absence of sb or sth)
empress/queen/(archaic) monarch/ruler
back/behind/rear/afterwards/after/later/post-
surname Hou

sentences.english: It is best to login or register first but you may post as a guest.
sentences.chinese: 只有半天时间，思前想后，还是再来六本木山一趟。

sentences.english: Season often focused on writing and playing fingerprints;
sentences.chinese: 季常思前想后，终画押和打手印。

sentences.english: Don't stall or stress over whether you're doing the right thing.
sentences.chinese: 不要为自己的作为是否正确而思前想后，紧张不安。

sentences.english: Zhe line focused, feel the whole thing is not simple.
sentences.chinese: 哲行思前想后，感觉到整件事情并不单纯。

sentences.english: After thinking it over, or talk about some of his hobbies bar.
sentences.chinese: 思前想后还是讲一下自己的某些兴趣爱好吧。

sentences.english: I'd given one man and thought it too much, while he gave four without grudging them.
sentences.chinese: 我献出一个人便思前想后，他献出了四个却毫无怨言。

definition: to turn over in one's mind (idiom); to think through from different angles/to ponder
to reckon/to consider/to turn over in one's mind
to think sth through/to consider carefully
to hesitate
mature reflection/after careful deliberations
to hesitate over what move to make (idiom); to waver/to shilly-shally
to ponder/to reckon/to turn sth over in one's mind
to make a firm resolution
hesitancy/indecision/to waver
over and over again/again and again
to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
to consider from all angles (idiom); to think hard/to rack one's brains
one's thoughts in a whirl (idiom); confused/disconcerted/upset
to weigh the pros and cons (idiom)
to consider/to ponder
